description: A statistical breakdown of the age of Civilian Complaint Review Board (CCRB) dockets, by year, measured from the date of the reports in the years 2205 through 2009. The age of the docket is measured by the number of open cases at the end of each reporting period.

name: CCRB: Age of Docket Measured from the Date of Report 2005 - 2009
